params(default_color=RandomizedColor, selected=Boolean, visible=Boolean, name=String)

Basic Parameterized Class for all visible Objects in simulation

Args: - default_color: optional str or tuple representing the default color of the agent. - visible: optional boolean indicating whether the agent is visible or not.
